title: Topic 004 Question 067
body: You have an Azure virtual machine named VM1.
You need to capture all the network traffic of VM1 by using Azure Network Watcher.
To which locations can the capture be written?
options: a file path on VM1 only
a Block blob premium account only
General purpose v2 standard and a file path on VM1 only
General purpose v2 standard and a Block blob premium account only
blob storage, a file path on VM1, and a Block blob premium account
